text: Ndithudi Mulungu wagula miyoyo ya anthu okhulupilira ndi chuma cha pa mtengo wakuti chawo chidzakhale Paradiso. Iwo amamenya nkhondo munjira ya Mulungu kotero amapha ndi kuphedwa. Ili ndi lonjezo loonadi kwa Iye limene lidzakwaniritsidwa ndipo liri mâ€™Buku la Chipangano chakale, Chipangano chatsopano ndi Korani. Kodi ndani amene amakwaniritsa lonjezo lake kuposa Mulungu? Iwo ali kusangalala ndi mgwirizano omwe mwachita. Kumeneko ndiko kupambana kwakukulu
